Tung Vu
Senior Software Engineer
Address23-22 The Pegasuite, Ta Quang Buu
ward 6, district 8
Ho Chi Minh City
Phone +84975136456
E-mail vutung.ct@gmail.com
Date of birth1987/11/23
I'm a dedicated team/individual worker. I love challenges and new technologies. To keep up with new technologies, I can quickly learn
and adapt new technologies and to overcome challenges, I keep practicing my skills again and again.
LinkedIn linkedin.com/in/vutung2311
Experience
2017 - present
Senior Software Engineer
Lazada Group
This is the first time I do Golang. Even though many people said that Go is highly opinionated, I see Go as the
right tool for the job.
Technical stack:
Products:
Golang •
PostgreSQL •
Redis •
Kubernetes •
Docker •
Transportation Management System is a system for managing package, package dimensions, package status
in the process of package transportation. This has some similarity with the product that I previously worked on
(Logistics Management System) but at a different level. The product doesn't manage daily job of driver or driver
or hub.
•
Smart routing (third party logistics company selection) is for routing package. It lets operator to select which
third party logistics company to do package pickup, and which to do package delivery base on the origin and
destination, dimensions, weight and delivery options of the package. There are many set of configurations that
operator need to set up for system to function properly (aka making the system smart).
•
Delivery promise (e-commerce product delivery estimation) is for estimating delivery time for a package. This
system face directly to the customers when they view the product on e-commerce page. Because of that this
system need to be fast (99% percentile of response time should be lower than or equal to 10ms). And because
of that I learnt quite a few things about optimize Golang http response time by myself.
•
2015/09 - 2016/11
PHP Developer
Lazada Group
This was the first time that I approached TDD. I realized how good TDD is and I kept practicing on it.
Technical stack:
Products:
PHP •
PostgreSQL •
Docker •
RabbitMQ •
Symfony •
Logistics Management System is about management of package, package status, daily job of driver, driver, hub.
MVC architecture was used. I also learnt about design pattern and performance optimization.
•
2014/11 - 2015/09
Senior PHP Developer
Zinio
This was the first time that I went to work in an office. Previously I did mostly remote job. During this time I learned
about eZ Publish, a opensource complex CMS, creating module/plugin/extension for it. Then soon I moved to the
task to write data gathering and pushing tool for business intelligence. This tool is a PHP script which connect to
FTP server, crunching data and then send data to REST api of keen.io
Backend Developer
Develop and maintain the CMS of the company.
•
Develop tools for Business Intelligence.
•
Implement analytics system for mobile newsstand.
•

experiences.detail:
This is the first time I do Golang. Even though many people said that Go is highly opinionated, I see Go as the right tool for the job.
Technical stack:
Products: Golang • PostgreSQL • Redis • Kubernetes • Docker • Transportation Management System is a system for managing package, package dimensions, package status in the process of package transportation. This has some similarity with the product that I previously worked on
(Logistics Management System) but at a different level. The product doesn't manage daily job of driver or driver or hub.
• Smart routing (third party logistics company selection) is for routing package. It lets operator to select which third party logistics company to do package pickup, and which to do package delivery base on the origin and destination, dimensions, weight and delivery options of the package. There are many set of configurations that operator need to set up for system to function properly (aka making the system smart).
• Delivery promise (e-commerce product delivery estimation) is for estimating delivery time for a package. This system face directly to the customers when they view the product on e-commerce page. Because of that this system need to be fast (99% percentile of response time should be lower than or equal to 10ms). And because of that I learnt quite a few things about optimize Golang http response time by myself.
•

This was the first time that I approached TDD. I realized how good TDD is and I kept practicing on it.
Technical stack:
Products: PHP • PostgreSQL • Docker • RabbitMQ • Symfony • Logistics Management System is about management of package, package status, daily job of driver, driver, hub.
MVC architecture was used. I also learnt about design pattern and performance optimization.
•

This was the first time that I went to work in an office. Previously I did mostly remote job. During this time I learned about eZ Publish, a opensource complex CMS, creating module/plugin/extension for it. Then soon I moved to the task to write data gathering and pushing tool for business intelligence. This tool is a PHP script which connect to
FTP server, crunching data and then send data to REST api of keen.io
